title: Council Decision of 20 March 2000 amending Decision 94/942/CFSP on the Joint Action concerning the control of exports of dual-use goods
header:
Council decision
of 20 March 2000
amending Decision 94/942/CFSP on the Joint Action concerning the control of exports of dual-use goods
(2000/243/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article 13 thereof,
Having regard to the general guidelines given by the European Council held at Lisbon on 26 and 27 June 1992,
Whereas:
(1) The lists of dual-use goods in Annexes I and IV to Decision 94/942/CFSP(1) should be amended to take into account commitments undertaken by Member States in international fora.
(2) For reasons of clarity, all the various versions should be combined in a single text,
main_body: Annexes I, II, III, IV and V to Decision 94/942/CFSP, as referred to in Council Regulation (EC) No 3381/94 of 19 December 1994 setting up a Community regime for the control of exports of dual-use goods(2), shall be replaced by Annexes I, II, III, IV and V set out in the Annex hereto.

This Decision shall enter into force on the day of its publication.
It shall apply from the 30th day following the date of its publication.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 March 2000.
For the Council
The President
J. Gama
(1) OJ L 367, 31.12.1994, p. 8. Decision as last amended by Decision 1999/193/CFSP (OJ L 73, 19.3.1999, p. 1).
(2) OJ L 367, 31.12.1994, p. 1. Regulation as amended by Regulation (EC) No 837/95 (OJ L 90, 21.4.1995, p. 1).
ANNEX
